item.title: US stocks climb amid signs government may avert shutdown
item.description: The gains erase some losses suffered during an escalating trade war.

item.title: Schumer defends support for GOP funding bill ahead of Senate votes to avoid shutdown

item.title: Consumer sentiment sours amid trade war, recession fears: Survey
item.description: The Trump administration's tariffs last week set off a market slump.
